title: A Man Who Connected a Prince and a Bad Person
summary: This story is about a man named David Stern. He helped connect Prince Andrew, who is a member of the British royal family, with Jeffrey Epstein, a man who did bad things and went to jail. In 2019, Stern was at a party in China for a business event called Pitch@Palace. Later, emails showed that Stern worked quietly in the background to make deals and help with money problems for Prince Andrew and his ex-wife, Sarah Ferguson. Stern was a businessman from Germany who lived in London and called Epstein his boss. He was also part of a royal charity. The article tells us that Stern's name appears in many government documents, but he doesn't talk about it. It's a story about how people can be connected in secret ways.

background_read: This article is about connections between people in powerful positions. Prince Andrew is part of the British royal family, which means he is related to the king or queen. Jeffrey Epstein was a wealthy man who was convicted of crimes involving bad behavior. David Stern is a businessman who helped them meet and do things together. The story comes from emails and documents released by the government, showing how people can work behind the scenes without many people knowing. It's important to learn about how secrets can affect others.
